Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx

Class DefaultOptions

java.lang.Object
io.github.zero88.schedulerx.DefaultOptions
public final class DefaultOptions extends Object
Instances of this class are used to configure the default Trigger options, and Job options.
Since:
2.0.0

    • maxExecutionTimeout

      public final Duration maxExecutionTimeout
      Declares the default max execution timeout. Defaults is VertxOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_WORKER_EXECUTE_TIME
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key DEFAULT_MAX_EXECUTION_TIMEOUT

    • maxEvaluationTimeout

      public final Duration maxEvaluationTimeout
      Declares the default max trigger evaluation timeout. Defaults is VertxOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_EVENT_LOOP_EXECUTE_TIME
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key DEFAULT_MAX_EVALUATION_TIMEOUT

    • maxTriggerRuleLeeway

      public final Duration maxTriggerRuleLeeway
      Declares the default max trigger rule leeway time. Defaults is 10 seconds.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key DEFAULT_MAX_TRIGGER_RULE_LEEWAY

    • maxTriggerPreviewCount

      public final int maxTriggerPreviewCount
      Declares the default max number of the trigger preview items. Defaults is 30.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key DEFAULT_MAX_TRIGGER_PREVIEW_COUNT

    • workerThreadPrefix

      public final String workerThreadPrefix
      Declares the default worker thread name prefix. Defaults is scheduler.x-worker-thread.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key DEFAULT_WORKER_THREAD_PREFIX

    • workerThreadPoolSize

      public final int workerThreadPoolSize
      Declares the default worker thread pool size. Defaults is 3.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key DEFAULT_WORKER_THREAD_POOL_SIZE

      public static DefaultOptions getInstance()
